data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stekolshchikov, Andrey V., Buga, Sergey V. (2018): The aphid fauna (Hemiptera, Sternorrhyncha, Aphidomorpha) of Murmansk province (Russia), with description of Aphis khrulevi sp. nov. and Dysaphis karyakini sp. nov. and males of Chaitophorus nigricantis Pintera, 1987. Zootaxa 4527 (4): 451-493, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4527.4.1|198 occurrences
